mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as count from m_goods where 1 = 1 and category_id = #{categoryId} ;
SELECT name,id,goods_brief,min_retail_price,list_pic_url,goods_number from m_goods where 1 = 1 AND category_id = #{categoryId} order by id limit #{currentPage},#{size};
SELECT * from m_goods where id = #{productId} and is_delete = 0 limit 1;
SELECT * FROM m_product WHERE goods_id = #{productId} AND is_delete = 0 ;
SELECT * FROM m_goods_specification WHERE goods_id = #{productId} AND is_delete = 0;
SELECT * FROM m_goods_gallery WHERE goods_id = #{productId} AND is_delete = 0 ORDER BY sort_order LIMIT 6;
SELECT * FROM m_goods WHERE is_on_sale = 1 AND is_delete = 0 AND name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') ORDER BY sort asc ORDER BY retail_price asc ORDER BY sell_volume desc
